DOC.brief_summary: A study determine effectiveness two weight loss maintenance intervention Counterweight Plus , structure weight management programme .
DOC.detailed_description: Introduction : Long-term maintenance non-surgical weight loss remain significant problem obesity treatment . This study compare effectiveness two different weight loss maintenance strategy use part Counterweight Plus weight management programme . This study also evaluate behavioural impact Counterweight Plus intervention include process evaluation cost analysis . Methods : 80 patient 10 practitioner recruit study . Main inclusion criterion patient : Completed Counterweight Plus , include 12-20 week total diet replacement ( TDR ) , 8 week food reintroduction ( FR ) achieve > 10kg weight loss . All participant follow 18 month total . Results : The primary outcome study difference weight change two group 6 month . Frequency use behavioural strategy quantify practitioner patient voice record consultation . The relationship weight change use behavioural strategy assess . Hypothesis : This study establish novel intermittent use formula diet strategy effective prevent weight regain comparison usual care . It also provide evidence frequency use behavioural strategy within routine Counterweight Plus delivery , well establish cost intervention .
DOC.criteria: Completed Counterweight Plus Total Diet Replacement Food Reintroduction stag achieve > 10kg weight loss People currently participate another clinical research trial ( include BEYOND Weight Loss study )
